mapper.select: select r1.grade, r1.price, r1.max_dogs, r1.room_image, r1.intro, r2.count from (select grade, price, max_dogs, room_image, intro from rooms where hotel_id = #{id} group by (grade, price, max_dogs, room_image, intro)) r1 left join (select grade, price, count(*) as count from rooms where id not in (select room_id from choose_rooms where reservation_id in (select id from reservations where to_date(#{date} , 'YYYY-MM-DD') between start_date and end_date and canceled = 0)) and hotel_id = #{id} group by (grade, price, max_dogs, room_image, intro)) r2 on r1.grade = r2.grade and r1.price = r2.price
